title: #MoreLoveLessHate: Downtown Madison restaurant reopens following suspected hate crime | Video | channel3000.com
text: [] #MoreLoveLessHate: Downtown Madison restaurant reopens following suspected hate crime The Dubai Mediterranean Restaurant, located on State Street in downtown Madison, reopened Thursday after a suspected hate crime that occurred there earlier this week.
